task.title: HOW TO SUBTRACT NUMBERS
task.shortdesc: HERE YOU WILL FIND INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE THE JPS CALCULATOR APP.

taskbody.prereq: TO SUCCESSFULLY SUBTRACT NUMBERS, YOU MUST KNOW WHAT IS SUBTRACTION
taskbody.result: THE RESULT FROM SUBTRATION IS DISPLAYED
taskbody.example: YOU WANT TO SUBTRACT 2 FROM 3. THE EQUATION WILL LOOK LIKE 3-2=1.YOU ENTER 3. PRESS MINUS. ENTER 2. PRESS EQUALS. THE RESULT 1 APPEARS ON THE SCREEN.
